sec.title: Roller and leaf chains
sec.p: Roller and leaf chains, which can be an integral part of the feed system of a rig and are directly involved in the pull-down and pull-up operation, shall meet the following:

list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: they should be selected with a safety factor, i.e. minimum breaking force in relation to maximum load, of 3,5;

list-item.label: b)
list-item.p: an adequate and safe means of tensioning shall be provided, if the design requires it;

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: where possible, chains shall wrap 180Â° around sprockets or guide pulleys.
